missionstate.description: Your mission is to investigate the 5 guards in Thais regarding the Heretic behavior. Tim, Kulag, Grof, Miles and Walter are their names. If you do well you see a holy sprite on you.
You investigated 1 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 2 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 3 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 4 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 5 of 5 guards in Thais. Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
You investigated all guards in Thais.

Henricus tells you to get The Witches' Grimoire, he sends you to Femor Hills where you can fly to the witches' mountain, say Eclipse to Uzon and he will take you there. Use the vial of holy water that he gives you on the big cauldron and open the chest to your left, then bring the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Find the witches' grimoire and bring it to Henricus.
You already brought the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Henricus wants you to find the Dwarfish Vampire Hunter, Storkus, located west of the Dwarf Bridge. It's good idea bring your 20 Vampire Dusts with you to save some time.
Go Back to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.

Now Storkus wants you to kill a vampire lord, The Count in the Green Claw Swamp, The Count is located near to the Blood Herb Quest. To summon The Count, you must use the coffin in the center of the room. Kill it and bring The Ring of the Count to Storkus.
Kill The Count and bring his ring to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.
Return to Henricus and tell him that you finished your job here.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Henricus will gave you a Special Flask (vial of holy water). Go to Liberty Bay and use the vial on an old house. Use this vial of holy water on that spot to drive out the evil being.
Kill the Pirate Ghost and get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
You already cleaned the abandoned and haunted house in Liberty, ask Henricus for mission.
Henricus wants 20 Demonic Essences as a proof of your accomplishments.
Now ask Henricus for outfit to get the Demon Hunter Outfit.
You got the Demon Hunter Outfit! Ask Henricus for mission to unlock more addons.
Henricus wants you to kill a demon called Ungreez. Head to Edron Hero Cave and go down a few levels.
You killed Ungreez, report your mission to Henricus.
You got the the first addon of Demon Hunter Outfit! Ask Henricus for mission to unlock more addons.
Your mission is to go to the Demon Forge and slay seven of The Ruthless Seven Minions. The Demon Forge is located in the Edron Hero Cave, through a portal after the Vampire Shield Quest.
You destroyed the shadow nexus! Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Now ask to Henricus for a outfit. He will give you the 2nd addon of the Demon Hunter Outfits.
You got the the second addon of Demon Hunter Outfit! Go now to the reward room and choose one wisely!
You have completed The Inquisition Quest! You can now buy the Blessing of the Inquisition!
Sam sends you to see Kroox in Kazordoon to get a special dwarven armor. Just tell him, his old buddy Sam is sending you.
You have the permission to retrive a dwarven armor from the mines. The problem is, some giant spiders made the tunnels where the storage is their new home.
You have completed Dwarven Armor Quest!
Big Ben, the cyclops in Ab'Dendriel sends you to bring him 3 bast skirts for his woman. After this he will help you to forge different steel.
Big Ben, the cyclops in Ab'Dendriel will help you to forge different steel now. Just ask him if you need something.
Marina, the mermaid north of Sabrehaven sends you to bring her 50 honeycombs. After this she will help you create spool of yarn.
Marina, the mermaid north of Sabrehaven will help you to create a spool of yarn from 10 pieces of spider silk. Just ask her if you need something.
You need a stake first. Maybe Gamon can help you, the leg of a chair or something could just do. Try asking him for a stake, and if you have one, bring it back to Quentin in Thais.
You bought a stake from Gamon, bring it back to Quentin in Thais
Now, bring your stake to Tibra in the Carlin church for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Maealil in the elven settlement for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Yberius in the Venore temple for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Isimov in the dwarven settlement for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Amanda in Edron for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Kasmir in Darashia for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Rahkem in Ankrahmun for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Brewster in Port Hope for the next line of the prayer.
Now, bring your stake to Tyrias in Liberty Bay for the next line of the prayer.
You received all blessings for the stake, now you can obtain weekly blessed wooden stake from Chondur in north of Sabrehaven.
Hairycles wants for you to infiltrate the Dworc Caves and steal some Whisper Moss which is said to be a cure. Find the Dworc Caves anywhere in Trapwood, the southern part of Tiquanda.
You brought Hairycles the Whisper Moss. Ask Hairycles for new mission!
Hairycles now needs Cough Syrup that humans use. He sends you to a local healer in Port hope to ask him for cough syrup.
You now have to find the druid Ustan to ask him about the cough syrup, you will find him in a tavern in port hope.
Ustan fear said I will have to buy Cough Syrup in the druids guild in carlin.
You bought the Cough Syrup from Padreia, bring it to Hairycles.
You brought Hairycles the Cough Syrup. Ask Hairycles for new mission!
Hairycles wants you to collect an Old Parchment from the lizard city of Chor.
You brought Hairycles the Old Parchment. Ask Hairycles for new mission!

You should go east to the big desert. The hidden tomb is in the east of city under sand. You will have to dig until you find it. There you find a stone with signs between two huge red stones. Read them!
You have decyhered the signs. Return to Hairycles and report you mission.
You reported Hairycles the signs. Ask Hairycles for new mission!.
Hairycles needs a Hydra Egg to prepare his charm. Your mission is to bring him one.
You found a Hydraegg! Bring it to Hairycles.
You brought Hairycles a Hydra Egg. Ask Hairycles for new mission!
Hairycles needs a sample of the Witches' Cap Spot for his Charm of Life. This can only be found in the Fibula Dungeon. Bring it to Hairycles!
Bring the sample back to Hairycles and report about your mission.
You are now a friend of the apes and can purchase Bananas for 2gp. Hairycles will also heal you if you are low in health. Ask Hairycles for new mission!
Hairycles wants you to destroy the Casks below the city left by the Lizard ancestors so that the Apes cannot drink from them.
You destroyed 1 of 3 Casks in Banuta
You destroyed 2 of 3 Casks in Banuta
You destroyed 3 of 3 Casks in Banuta! Ask Hairycles for new mission!

mission.name: Mission 8: Looking for a hair of holy ape

missionstate.description: Hairycles aims to strengthen the spirit of the apes. He wants for you to find evidence of the holy ape figure Bong existing within the Forbidden Lands. Find and ask the Blind Prophet in North-east of Tiquanda for transport.
You found the Giant Ape's Hair! Bring it to Hairycles.
You brought Hairycles the Giant Ape's Hair! You have now still access to the Forbidden lands. Ask Hairycles for new mission!

Hairycles wants you to go deep under Banuta and find the Lizards' serpent god monument and destroy it. On accepting this mission you will receive a Snake Destroyer (you will need this) and gain entry to Deeper Banuta.
You destroyed the Statue of the Snake God. Return to Hairycles and report your mission.
You completed the Ape City Quest and got the Shamanic Outfit! You can now buy Monkeystatues from Hairycles!
Ongulf sends you to explore the passage to the east of farmine.
You have found the passage through the mountains and can report Ongulf about your success.
You already reported Ongulf your success! Ask Ongulf for new mission!
Ongulf will tell you that he needs to send a message to the dwarves in Kazordoon. Travel there and then walk to the Dwarf Mines to the west. Cross the two rivers and find Melfar.
Melfar gave you a Flask with Beaver Bait that you must use on the 3 trees(Trees will be marked on your map).
You marked 1 of 3 trees with Beaver Bait in near the Dwarf Mines
You marked 2 of 3 trees with Beaver Bait in near the Dwarf Mines
You marked all 3 trees with Beaver Bait in near the Dwarf Mines. Return to talk to Melfar before heading back to Farmine.
Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
You need to find the tribe which lives in the mountains. Find some vines in this mountain, climb up there and find out who is spying on us!
Return to Ongulf and report your mission about primitive humans.
You already reported Ongulf about primitive humans! Ask Ongulf for new mission!
Head back to the levers and this time use the left one. Go North through the tunnel of Stone Golems. Kill the boss, Shard of Corruption at the end of the tunnel.
You killed the Shard of Corruption. Return to Ongulf and report your mission!

This mission consists of getting support from 6 people (King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron, Humgolf in Kazordoon around Tibia. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 1 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 2 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 3 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 4 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 5 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!
You got support from all needed people to help farmine! Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
Go to Curos, leader of the Orcs, in the middle of the Zao Steppe in the north-east area of an Orc camp. Ask for a mission and accept it.
Enter the ring of battle, close to Curos quarter. Face Mooh'Tah Master in a battle and survive for two minutes. Return to him after you have passed this test.
You passed the test of Curos. Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
You now have to contact the Lizards, the real rulers of Zao. Find them, contact them, talk to them, scare them, bribe them, whatever.
You have been trapped! Find a way out!
You found the Lizards!

mission.name: Mission 08: An Offer You Can't Refuse

missionstate.description: Take the boat at the northern of Dragonblaze Peaks to tournament Isle. Ask Zurak for a passage. There you'll learn anything you need to know about the great tournament. Ask there Chrak for the battle.
You agreed the Offer.
You have to go into the Arena with another player, because 2 players are needed, at the same time, to enter. Choose your companion wisely!
You have won! Report Chrak your mission about the battle.
Go back to Farmine and talk to Ongulf about your mission.

mission.name: Mission 10: New Horizons
mission.description: You now have permission to use the Magic Carpet on the mountain above Farmine, Cael now accepts more Tomes of Knowledge from you and you got the Warmaster Outfit!

missionstate.description: You brought the fist Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the lizard culture. Pompan will sell you dragon tapestries from now on.
You brought the second Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the minotaur culture. Pompan will sell you minotaur backpacks from now on.
You brought the third Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the last stand of the draken culture. Esrik will sell you lizard weapon rack from now on.

You brought the fourth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about a certain food that the lizardmen apparently prepare. Swolt will trade you a bunch of ripe rice for 10 rice balls from now on.
You brought the fifth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the last stand of the lizards in the South, Zzaion. Pompan will sell you lizard backpacks from now on.
You brought the sixth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt a few things about the primitive human culture on this continent. Cael will sell you War Drums and Didgeridoo from now on.
You brought the seventh Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about the Zao steppe. Now you to use the snake teleport at the peak of the mountain.
You brought the eighth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt a few things about an illness. Now you can enter a corruption hole in the north-eastern end of Zao.
You brought the ninth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about the Draken origin. Esrik will buy lizard equipment from you now.

You brought the tenth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the last stand of the lizard dynasty. Now you can enter the Zao Palace. It is situated deep underground, below the mountain base of the Lizards.
You brought the eleventh Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about dragons and their symbolism. You can buy a Dragon Statue from NPC Cael after you bring him a Red Lantern.

You brought the twelfth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something about reveals some of the power structures in Zao. Cael will now make a Dragon Throne for you after you bring him a Red Piece of Cloth. He will reward you with 5000 experience points for each extra tome you give to him.
Your Mission is to go to a little camp of lizards at north-east of the Dragonblaze Peaks. You have to find and deliver the Tactical map complete the mission.
You delivered the Tactical map to Zalamon.
Go to the Temple of Equilibrium (it's marked on your map) and find out what happened there.
The temple has been corrupted and is lost. Zalamon should be informed about this as soon as possible.
You already reported Zalamon about the Temple! Ask him for new mission!
Go into the small camp Chaochai to the north of the Dragonblaze Peaks (Zalamon marks the entrance on your map). There are 3 buildings which you have to spy
You spied 1 of 3 buildings of the camp.
You spied 2 of 3 buildings of the camp.
You spied 3 of 3 buildings of the camp. Zalamon should be informed about this as soon as possible.
You already reported Zalamon about the camp! Ask him for new mission!

Get the poison from Zalamon's storage room. Then go to the teleporter to the Muggy Plains and head east from there to the rice fields. Go to the very top rice field and use the poison anywhere on the water.
The rice has been poisoned. This will weaken the Emperor's army significantly. Return and tell Zalamon about your success.
You already reported Zalamon about your success! Ask him for new mission!
Your mission is to find a way to enter the north of the valley and find a passage to the great gate itself. Search any temples or settlements you come across for hidden passages.
Report Zalamon about the strange symbols that you found.
Get the greasy oil from Zalamon's storage room and put them on the levers that you found.
Due to being extra greasy, the leavers can now be moved.
You found the right combination for the puzzle in the mountains and triggered some kind of mechanism. You should head back to Zalamon to report your success.
You already reported Zalamon about your success! You got a Tome of Knowledge as reward! Ask him for new mission!
Your mission is to use the portal in the chamber beyond the mechanism. It will lead you to the great gate.
Eternal guardians and lizard chosen has been awaken. Survive them and report it to Zalamon!
You Survived the Waves and reported Zalamon about your success! You got a Serpent Crest as reward!
Your mission is to find the Holy Skull. It is in a cave in the northern orc settlement, which is located north-west on the Zao Steppe.
You found the Holy Skull. Retrieve it to Lazaran in the Zao Mountains.
You brought Lazaran the Holy Skull. Ask him for new mission!

missionstate.description: Talk to Sven about mead and give him a honeycomb. For each honeycomb you will be allowed 20 sips.
Now drink from the bucket until you drink 10 sips in a row without passing out
You have completed this Test! Talk to Sven about the mead.

Sven gave you a Mead Horn. Fill it with mead from the bucket behind Sven (brown contents) and then proceed to the sleeping bear. The bear is inside a small ice cave in the north. Use the full mead horn on the bear so it becomes unconscious, then use the bear to hug it.
You hugging the bear! Go tell Sven that you hugged the bear!
You have completed this Test!
Go to the north-west of Svargrond and find the Mammoth. Drink your three mugs of mead, stand in front of the Mammoth and push it. Just use it...
You pushed the Mammoth! Go tell Sven that you pushed the Mammoth!
You have completed this Test! You can now be a citizen of Svargrond!

Find Sniffler the husky of Iskan. He should be somewhere north west of the town. He is probably marking his territory so you should be able to find his trace. Call him sniffler and feed him with meat.
Tell Iskan that you found and feed Sniffler
You are now a friend of Iskan and can ask him for a passage to Nibelor. You should ask Hjaern in Nibelor if you can help him.
Chakoyas may use the ice for a passage to the west and attack Svargrond. Use the rocks at east of nibelor on at least three of these places and the chakoyas probably won't be able to pass the ice.
You have broke 1 of 3 icepassages
You have broke 2 of 3 icepassages
You have broke 3 of 3 icepassages! Tell Hjaern your mission!
You should ask Silfind if you can help her in some matters.
Siflind send you to travel to a distant land to get ants from an Ant-Hill to perform ecological terrorism on some pirates on Tyrsung. Just use the jug on an anthill.

Now head back to Svargrond and go to Buddel, the drunk sailor in southern Svargrond, and ask him to take you to Tyrsung. Now go all the way to the southern shores where you find a outpost. Go to the bottom deck and use the jug with the western mast
Go tell Siflind that you released the ants and aks her for mission!
Siflind gave you a Vial of Paint to use on some Baby Seals. Go back to Tyrsung and follow the shore from Buddel south. Use the Vial of Paint on three of these seals.
Go tell Siflind that you painted the seals and aks her for mission!
The first things needed are 5 bat wings to brew a berserker elixir. Bring her them!
The next items Siflind need are 4 bear paws. Bring her them!
The next items Siflind need are 3 bonelord eyes. Bring her them!
The next items Siflind need are 2 fish fins. Bring her them!
The next item Siflind need is a green dragon scale. Bring her that!
You helped Siflind to defend Svargrond. Now Nilsor need help, go ask him for mission.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 1st of 7 ingredients: a Part of the Sun Adorer Cactus. Only an ordinary kitchen knife will be precise enough to produce the ingredient weneed.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 2nd of 7 ingredients: Geyser Water in a Waterskin. Use it on a geyser that is NOT active. The water of active geysers is far too hot.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 3rd of 7 ingredients: Fine Sulphur. Use an ordinary kitchen spoon on an inactive lava hole.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 4th of 7 ingredients: the Frostbite Herb. You can find it on mountain peaks. You will need to cut it with a fine kitchen knife.

To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 5th of 7 ingredients: Purple Kiss Blossom. The purple kiss is a plant that grows in a place called jungle. You will have to use a kitchen knife to harvest its blossom.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 6th of 7 ingredients: the Hydra Tongue. The hydra tongue is a common pest plant in warmer regions. You might find one in a shop.

To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 7th of 7 ingredients: Spores of a Giant Glimmercap Mushroom. The giant glimmercap mushroom exists in caves and other preferably warm and humid places. Use an ordinary kitchen spoon on a mushroom to collectits spores.
You found all ingredients to cure Nilsor dogs, ask him for mission. You can now travel by Dog Sleds to Inukaya.
Hjaern might have a mission for you. So maybe you go and talk to him.
Hjaern send you to find someone in Svargrond who can give you a passage to Helheim and seek the reason for the unrest there.
You discovered the necromantic altar and should report Hjaern about it.
Get out of Nibelor and go to the Svargrond Explorer's Society. Ask Lurik for the mission.
Get to the raider camp, then follow to the extreme south where you find lots of barbarians. Near the southern most coastline, try looking for the NPC Nor. Ask him about Memory Crystal.
Go back to Lurik and deliver him the memory crystal.
Give Lurik some time to evaluate the information (ca. 5min). Then talk to him again about your mission.
Find the entrance of the Formorgar Mines. Find some hint or someone who is willing to talk about what is going on there.
You found a old and tattered written paper in a skeleton next to a Restless Soul, you can only make out a signature: Tylaf, apprentice of Hjaern. Ask Hjaern about Tylaf.
Go back to the mine and ask the restless soul about his story.
You already have listen to his story!
The Cultists plan is to create a new demon army for their master to conquer the world. Hjaern and the other shamans must learn about it! Hurry before its too late.
The Cultists plan is to create a new demon army for their master to conquer the world. Hjaern and the other shamans are already informed!
Hjaern gave you a spirit charm of cold. Travel to the mines and find four special obelisks to mark them with the charm.
1 of 4 obelisks are marked.
2 of 4 obelisks are marked.
3 of 4 obelisks are marked.
Once all 4 obelisks are marked report back to Hjaern.
You got the Norseman outfit and you have access to the Yakchal room deep in the Formorgar Mines.
Bring Hanna in Thais 100 chicken feathers, 50 honeycombs and a legion helmet to get the hat
You got the Outfit!
Bring Lubo in northeast of Thais 100 minotaur leather to get the Backpack
You got the Outfit!

Bron told you that his brother Ajax in Northport needs to learn that violence is not always the answer. He told you to make his brother angry, then show him that all he needed to do was say 'please' to fix the situation.
You will need to leave Ajax alone for an hour, then return to him.
Ajax told you that he has thought about it, and that violence is not always good. Return to Bron now, and tell him that Ajax said fist not always good
Bron mentioned that he has someone in his house that he doesn't like, and he wants you to get advice from Ajax about how to handle the situation. Go back to Ajax and ask him about Gelagos
Ajax told you his brother needs Fighting Spirit, and that you should get some from a Djinn and give it to him.
You brought Bron the Fighting Spirit. He acted a little strange.
In order to make a shirt as a present for Ajax, Bron wants you to bring him 50 Pieces of Red Cloth and 50 Pieces of Green Cloth.
Bron wants you to bring him 10 Spider Silk Yarn.
Bron wants you to bring him the Warrior's Sweat.
You brought him all required items! accept it!
You got the Barbarian Wig Addon! Bring now the present from Bron to Ajax!
Bring Ajax in Northport 100 Iron Ore.
Bring Ajax 1 Huge Chunk of Crude Iron.
Bring Ajax 50 Perfect Behemoth Fang
Bring Ajax 50 Lizard Leather
Come later in 2 hours and ask Ajax for the axe.
You got the Axe Addon!
Ceiron sends you to collect a sample of the blooming Griffinclaw.
Ask Ceiron for task.

take Ceirons waterskin and try to fill it with water from this special trickle. In the mountains between Ankrahmun and Tiquanda are two hydra lairs. It is important that you take the water directly from the trickle, not from the pond
Ask Ceiron for task.
Bring Ceiron 100 ounces of demon dust.
Ask Ceiron for task.
The last mission is to find and retrieve Ceiron's Wolf Tooth Chain lost inside the Orc Fortress.
Ask Ceiron for Faolan.
Head over to Cormaya, find A Majestic Warwolf's Cave and ask her about an addon.
You got the Outfit!
Elane sends you to Liberty Bay to bring her the Crossbow from the Cult.
Bring Elane 100 pieces of lizard leather and 100 pieces of red dragon leather.
Bring Elane 5 enchanted chicken wings.
Bring Elane one piece of royal steel, draconian steel and hell steel each.
You got the Outfit!
First you must collect 100 Behemoth Fangs by looting or Skinning Behemoth's. Bring them to Gregor in Thais.
Gregor send you to retrieve the helmet of Ramsay the Reckless found in deeper Banuta
Bring Gregor a Flask of Warrior's Sweat.
Bring Gregor one piece of royal steel.
Gregor send you to Sam to adorn your helmet.
You got the Outfit!
You found Angelina in a Prison. She told you a secret: Lynda in Thais can create a blessed wand. Greet her from Angelina, maybe she will aid you.
Lynda send you to bring her a sample of all five wands and five rods (Snakebite, Moonlight, Necrotic, Terra, Hailstorm, Vortex, Dragonbreath, Decay, Cosmic Energy and Inferno)
Bring Lynda 10 ounces of magic sulphur
Bring Lynda the Necromancer's soul stone
Bring Lynda 20 ankhs now to complete the ritual.
You got the Outfit!
Now you can get a lottery ticket at Sandra for 100 empty vials.
You got the Outfit! Now you can get for a lottery prize 50000 gold!
Bring Myra in port hope 70 bat wings
Bring Myra in port hope 20 pieces of red cloth
Bring Myra in port hope 40 pieces of ape fur
Bring Myra in port hope 35 holy orchids
Bring Myra in port hope 10 spools of spider silk yarn
Bring Myra in port hope 60 lizard scales
Bring Myra in port hope 40 red dragon scales
Bring Myra in port hope 15 ounces of magic sulphur
Bring Myra in port hope 30 ounces of vampire dust
Go to the academy in Edron and tell Zoltan that Myra sent you!
You got the Outfit!
Bring Hjaern 5 frostheart shards to get the first Addon. Ask him for shard!
Bring Hjaern 10 frostheart shards to get the second Addon. Ask him for shard!
You got the Outfit Addons! You can trade the rest shards to Hjaern for 2000 gold each!
Bring Trisha in Carlin 100 Hardened Bones
Bring Trisha in Carlin 100 Turtle Shells
Bring Trisha in Carlin 1 Spirit Container
Bring Trisha in Carlin 1 Dragon Claw
Go ask Cornelia in Carlin to adorn your armour.
You got the Outfit!
Bring Lugri the Medusa shield!
Bring Lugri the Dragon Scale Mail!
Bring Lugri the Crown Legs!
Bring Lugri the Ring of the Sky!
You got the first Outfit Addon!
Bring The Queen Of The Banshees 50 Holy Orchids and she will reward you with the second addon.
You got the second Outfit Addon!
Bring Duncan 100 Eye Patches from pirates!
Bring Duncan 100 peg legs from pirates!
Bring Duncan 100 pirate hooks from pirates!
Go to Morgan and tell him this codeword: 'firebird' to get the outfit addon!
You got the Outfit Addon!
Palimuth asked you to help with some sewer malfunctions. You will need a Crowbar, there are 4 places where you need to go marked with an X on your map.
You cleaned 1 pipe of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 2 pipes of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 3 pipes of 4 from the garbage.

You cleaned all pipes from the garbage! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.

The first is to bring Tamerin a flask of Animal Cure, you can buy this from Siflind on Nibelor (northeast of Svargrond).
now you have to kill Morik the Gladiator and bring his helmet to Tamerin as proof.

Report back to Tamerin as he will listen to your request and you can now make your choice: Cattle for Palimuth (good side), Warbeasts for Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side). Then report the one you decided your mission.

Yalahari (Azerus) orders you to travel to the Cemetery Quarter and find the Strange Carving. He gives you a Ghost Charm and tells you to charge it with the tormented souls of the ghosts there to be used as an energy source. Palimuth wants the Charged Ghost Charm in order to free those souls. You can new use the Cemetery Quarter mechanism now. Go to the big building in the Cemetery Quarter and use the Ghost Charm on the Strange Carving at the back of the room.
Good side: Go to Palimuth, ask him about your mission, and hand in the charm. Bad side: Ask about your mission to Yalahari (Azerus) and give it back.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: Yalahari (Azerus) will send you for a new mission to go to the Sunken Quarter and kill the Quara Leaders, Inky, Splasher and Sharptooth. Good side: Rather than fighting any Quara leaders Palimuth will instead send you to find the cause for the Quaras aggressive behavior. Find Maritima and talk to her about the Quara and she will explain what their problem is.
Get back to Palimuth and report him your mission.

Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.

You now need to decide between supporting Palimuth or the Yalahari's goal. To choose Palimuth's good side go to him, and simply ask him for a mission mission. Likewise, to join the Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side) go to him and say the same.
you already decided!
Palimuth told you that a circle of Yalahari is planning some kind of ritual. They plan to create a portal for some powerful demons and to unleash them in the city to 'purge' it once and for all.
The entrance to their inner sanctum has been opened for you. Be prepared for a HARD battle! Better gather some friends to assist you.
Report back to whichever principal you have chosen to help and you will receive Yalaharian Outfits.
You got the access to the reward room. Choose carefully which reward you pick as you can only take one item.
You have completed the Quest!
Your first mission for becoming a recognized trader is to bring the traveling salesman Rashid a Deer Trophy.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Your mission is to get the package from Willard the weapon dealer at Edron.
Willard forgot to pick it up from Snake Eye at Outlaw Camp. So he wants you to go and pick it up from Snake Eye.
Take the package just next door.
Now bring back the package to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid wants you to pick his special order from Miraia in Darashia. But you have to be quick, Scarab cheese can rot really fast in high temperature.
Now quickly bring back the Scarab cheese to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid have ordered a special elven vase from Briasol in Ab'Dendriel. He asks you to buy it from Briasol and bring it back.\nBut you should be carefully, since the vase is very fragile.
Now carefully bring the vase back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
This time, Rashid is testing your trading skills to buy a Crimson Sword from Uzgod. But it have to be less than 400 gold coins and the quality has to be perfect.
Now bring the sword back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid wants you to bring him a Goldfish Bowl.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid has declare you as one of his recognized traders, and now you are able to trade with him anytime..
Now you are ready to meet one of the Djinn leaders. Remember they only answer, if you greet them with the secret word: DJANNI'HAH

Santiago asked you to go into his house. Upstairs you will find a chest. You can keep what you find inside of it. Once you got that, talk to Santiago again.
You have found Santiago's Coat and reported back to him. Your quest is not done yet, you should talk to him a bit more.
Santiago gave you a weapon. After equipping it, go to the cellar of his house to find out about the cockroach plague.
You brought the cockroach legs to Santiago. He still has something to tell you though.
Santiago asked you, if those cockroaches hurt you. You should reply to him!
Santiago has a valuable lesson for you. You should talk to him again.
Santiago showed you how some monsters might hurt you. Better to talk to him to learn a way to heal yourself.
Santiago gave you some fish! Just 'use' it to eat it and regain health. Afterwards, you should talk to Santiago again.
Santiago asked you if you had seen Zirella. Don't let him wait for the answer.
You have helped Santiago a lot by killing the cokcroaches in his cellar. In exchange, he gave you equipment and some valuable experience. Well done!
You have a vague idea that Zirella might need you for collecting firewood, but you don't know yet where to get it. You should talk to her again.
You know that the branches Zirella needs might be gotten from dead trees in the forest south of here, but you don't know the details yet. You should talk to her again.

You know that you have to 'Use' the branch. Then leftclick with the changed cursor on the cart. Now you just have to tell Zirella that you will help her.
Go into the forest south of here and look for trees without leaves. 'Use' one to break a branch from it, then drag & drop the branch back to her cart and 'Use' it with the cart.
You have brought a branch to Zirella, congratulations! You should talk to her again for your reward.
You have helped Zirella by collecting wood for her. The reward can be found in her house.

Carlos asked you whether you could bring him some food. Talk to him again to learn how to find food here.
Carlos asked you to hunt some deer and rabbits and loot them to find a piece of ham or meat. However you haven't agreed yet, so you should tell him that you'll do it.
You agreed to bring Carlos some food. Hunt some deer or rabbit until you find a piece of meat or ham talk to Carlos again.
To sell the meat or ham to Carlos, talk to him and ask him for a 'trade'.
You sucessfully learnt how to change your outfit and how to trade with NPCs. Time to head over the bridge to Rookgaard!
